metadata.title: Example Crime Story
metadata.author: Story Team
metadata.description: A simple example story to demonstrate the cartridge structure.

storyInfo.premise: A crime has been committed and detectives must investigate to find the culprit.
storyInfo.theme: Justice and truth prevail through careful investigation.
storyInfo.mapImagePrompt: A high-contrast, black and white noir-style map of Example City. Crime scenes are highlighted in red.

introSlideshow.imagePrompt: A vintage photograph showing the beginning of the investigation.
introSlideshow.narration: The story begins with a crime that needs solving...

introSlideshow.imagePrompt: A detective examining evidence at the crime scene.
introSlideshow.narration: Evidence is discovered and the investigation begins...

characters.name: John Doe
characters.imagePrompt: A middle-aged man in business attire.
characters.bio: The victim of the crime. A respected business owner in the community.

characters.name: Jane Smith
characters.imagePrompt: A woman with a determined expression.
characters.bio: A former employee with a possible motive.
characters.statement: I didn't do it. I was at home all day.

props.persona: You are a suspect being interviewed by detectives.
suggestedQuestions: Where were you on the night of the crime?
What was your relationship with the victim?
slideshowPrompts: Body cam footage of suspect being interviewed.
Close-up of suspect's face during questioning.

dialogue.question: Where were you on the night of the crime?
dialogue.answer: I was at home watching TV.

dialogue.question: What was your relationship with the victim?
dialogue.answer: We used to work together. I was fired last month.

locations.sceneSummary: The victim was found here with fatal injuries.
locations.lastEventDescription: Crime Scene Established. Victim: John Doe.

testimonies.title: Statement from Jane Smith
testimonies.content: I didn't do it. I was at home all day.

bounties.title: Find the Weapon
bounties.description: Locate the murder weapon to advance the case.

clues.text: The victim had recently fired the suspect from their job.
A witness saw the suspect at the crime scene at the time of the murder.
The murder weapon was found with the suspect's fingerprints.

suspects.question: What was your relationship with the victim?
suspects.answer: I used to work for them. I was fired last month.

suspects.question: Where were you on the night of the crime?
suspects.answer: I was at home watching TV. I have no alibi.

events.question: What do you know about the crime?
events.answer: Nothing. I heard about it on the news.

questions.question: What did you see that night?
questions.answer: I saw someone leaving the building around the time of the crime.

questions.question: Can you describe the person you saw?
questions.answer: It was dark, but I think it was a woman.

physicalProfile.description: A woman of average height with brown hair and blue eyes.
physicalProfile.distinguishingFeatures: A small scar on her left cheek.
physicalProfile.mannerisms: Fidgets with her hands when nervous.

voiceTone.style: Speaks quickly when nervous, uses short sentences.
